short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Chromium that allows you to generate strong passwords of up to 50 characters length.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Strong Password Generator is a tool that can generate strong passwords of up to 50 characters in length. 

Since it has become a problem nowadays to protect your passwords as the process to crack a password is getting faster every day, Strong Password Generator will help you generate passwords that contain alpha-numeric characters and symbols of up to 50 characters in length making your password almost impossible to crack.
